fields.System.Title: As a product manager, I can upload design mockup images to user stories
fields.System.Description: As a product manager, I want to upload one design mockup image (PNG/JPG, max 5MB) to a user story so that developers have visual context when implementing features. The image should be stored in AWS S3 and displayed as a thumbnail in the story description with the ability to view full size.
fields.Custom.SuccessCriteria:
- Given I am editing a user story, when I click the 'Add Image' button, then a file picker opens accepting only PNG/JPG files
- Given I select a valid image â‰¤5MB, when I upload it, then it appears as a thumbnail with upload progress indicator
- Given I select a file >5MB or wrong format, when I attempt upload, then I see error message 'File must be PNG or JPG format and under 5MB'
- Given an image is uploaded successfully, when I save the story, then the thumbnail displays in the description with proper alt text
- Given a story contains an image, when any team member views it, then the image loads within 3 seconds
